short_description: vanovation is an auto parts manufacturer based in squamish, british columbia, canada.
long_description: for that reason, we don't offer a standardized "package." our designers will work closely with you every step of the way to create your fantasy home and build it into reality. we know you've been dreaming about #vanlife, sweet summer road trips, life in the great wide open. we're here to turn those dreams into reality. bespoke builds starts at c$95,000. larger vehicles, custom design/layout, and bespoke services will add to the build time. we charge a shop rate of c$115 per/hr for any bespoke work. this includes specialist services such as lift kits/suspension upgrades. the vanovation team brings together an eclectic mix of characters. our head of design is an ex-industrial designer turned bus conversion specialist with a keen eye for innovative design and solutions.
business_tags: electrical & plumbing | building repairs | spray foam insulation | materials & parts | roof vents | electrical systems | general contractor | industrial design | fridges | custom wood works | heavy machinery | milling works | window install | ford transit | custom interiors | vehicle customization | school bus | suspension upgrades | custom features | lift kits / suspensions
generated_description: vanovation, legally known as vanovation custom conversions inc., is a company based in squamish, british columbia, specializing in the conversion of vans and school buses. the company offers a range of services including school bus conversions, sprinter, promaster, and transit van conversions, as well as partial and diy conversions. vanovation provides services such as spray foam insulation, window installation, solar integration, 12v/120v electrical systems, plumbing, and custom cabinetry. the team at vanovation includes an ex-industrial designer with a background in engineering and custom woodwork, as well as an in-house mechanic certified to repair heavy machinery, buses, and cars. the company is known for its personalized approach, working closely with clients to create custom designs and ensuring high-quality craftsmanship.
